title: Valles Caldera National Preserve: Permits & Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations              Permits & Reservations       Reservations   No advance reservations are needed to enter the preserve.  Be sure to check for opening and closing dates for facilities inside the preserve.  For information on lodging or camping outside the preserve, visit nearby cities.      Permits    Fishing Permits  Backcountry Vehicle Permits  Equestrian Use Permits Hunting Permits Special Use Permits  Commercial Use Authorization
